meanings.definition: The process of putting something into mechanical motion or action.
meanings.sent1: The actuations of the robot's arms were precise and efficient.
meanings.sent2: The actuations of the engine were smooth and steady.
meanings.sent3: The actuations of the dancing robot brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: Her actuations on the piano keys were like a gentle breeze through a field of flowers.
meanings.sent5: The actuations of the clock's gears were mesmerizing to watch.

meanings.definition: The act of causing something to happen or occur.
meanings.sent1: His actuations led to the success of the project.
meanings.sent2: The actuations of the storm resulted in heavy rainfall.
meanings.sent3: The actuations of the mischievous cat caused chaos in the house.
meanings.sent4: The actuations of the magician made the audience gasp in amazement.
meanings.sent5: The actuations of the volcano created a spectacular display of nature's power.

meanings.definition: The act of performing a specific action or task.
meanings.sent1: Her actuations in the play were captivating to the audience.
meanings.sent2: The actuations of the chef in the kitchen were swift and precise.
meanings.sent3: The actuations of the clown at the party brought laughter to everyone.
meanings.sent4: His actuations on the basketball court were like poetry in motion.
meanings.sent5: The actuations of the acrobat were graceful and awe-inspiring.
